modName: Batch File All Generic Magic Items
summary: Batch file for all the generic magic apparel and weapons. Useful for adding all enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
A batch script that will add one of each generic magic apparel and weapons.
Just put the 'enchant.txt' file in the same folder as your Skyrim.exe, run your game, open the console and type: bat enchant
This will add all the items to your inventory, so you can just go to an enchanting table and disenchant it all.
author: Jobac

files.name: Bat file all generic enchanted items
files.fileName: Bat file all generic enchanted items-52131-1-0.rar
